title: Ka tlantu khawiah nge a awm
lyrics:
Ka tlantu khawiah nge a awm?
Tiin ka rawn zawng zel a,
Ka tan thil ropui min ruatsak a,
Ka chatuan van lawmna tur.

Aw, ka Tlantu ropui,
Aw, ka Chhandamtu mak ber;
Ka tan thing anchhe dawngah i lo tuar,
Ka Lal leh Tlantu i ni.

Aw, i khawngaih thuk leh zauzia,
Tu man an hmu phak ngai lo;
Van mi thianghlimte zawng zawng pawhin,
A thukzia an hmu phak lo.

Aw, i lo kal lai ang khanin,
Tunah ka hmu thei lo che;
Mahse i mi hmangaihna thuchah,
Ka thinlungah a cham reng.

Aw, ka thlarau, va kal zel la,
I Tlantu Lal hnenah chuan,
A kut ding lamah va thu langin
I chatuan khawpuiah chuan
